page.title: 18People of East Leicester.
page.content: {Cllr.Mrs.I.Pollard CBE,}Evington - Conservative City Councillor & Alderman. Lord Mayor of Leicester 1974 Leics. County Council 1975. Chairman Housing Committee & Education Comm. Chairman Board of Governors Linden, Whitehall,Uplands,Moat & Mundella schools. {Mr.S.Tipton MBE,}Evington - Administrator Leicester Royal Infirm- ary until 1980. Member Royal British Legion. Board of Governors Linden School. {Mr.A.Mackintosh,}Evington - Local Historian,author of 'Bygone Evington', 'Shady Lane' & 'The Green Bicycle Affair'. {Mr.I.Meadows MA,}Evington - BBC TV Mastermind 1985. Educated Leicester Grammar School & Trinity College, Cambridge.Presently a hospital driver, but hopes for a history research post.
